com.here.msdkui.routing

Class ManeuverListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ManeuverListAdapter.ViewHolder>
      • com.here.msdkui.routing.ManeuverListAdapter

  • public class ManeuverListAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ManeuverListAdapter.ViewHolder>
    A RecyclerView.Adapter to bind a view item of the list to a ManeuverItemView.
